description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge has appeared on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website, hinting at an imminent launch in India. Teased briefly at the Galaxy Unpacked event in January, it was later showcased at Mobile World Congress (MWC 2025). As the slimmest model in the Galaxy S25 series, the handset is expected to feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, similar to the other three models already released.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge India Launch Anticipated as Handset Reportedly Surfaces on BIS Website

description: Microsoft is developing Copilot for Gaming, an AI assistant for Xbox gamers. Announced in a blog post, it will streamline gaming experiences by providing tutorials, in-game assistance, and natural language support for installing or updating games. Additionally, it will offer players progress recaps. It will initially be available on smartphones, Microsoft says that Xbox Insiders will get early access to this feature.
title: Microsoft Unveils Copilot for Gaming With In-Game Assistance, Seamless Game Setup for Xbox Gamers

description: Redmi Note 14s has been launched as a rebranded version of the Redmi Note 13 Pro 4G, along with support for 4G connectivity and a MediaTek Helio G99-Ultra chipset. It features a 200-megapixel rear camera, a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, and an in-display fingerprint sensor. Here's everything you need to know about the Redmi Note 14s price and specifications.
title: Redmi Note 14s With 200-Megapixel Rear Camera, MediaTek Helio G99-Ultra Chipset Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Apple's AI struggles were highlighted when Siri's head, Robby Walker, told staff that delays to key features were "ugly and embarrassing." During an internal meeting, Walker acknowledged Siri’s challenges and the unclear timeline for enhancements. Apple's crisis deepened last week with public acknowledgment of indefinite delays for critical features, further emphasising Siri’s lag behind rivals in AI capabilities.
title: Apple’s Siri Chief Said to Acknowledge AI Delays, Promise Fixes

description: Apple's AirPods will reportedly receive a software update that introduces a conversation translation feature. These TWS (truly wireless stereo) headsets will utilise a connected iPhone's processor to enable real-time translation of in-person conversations. While this feature is already available on Google's Pixel Buds with Pixel phones, Apple had earlier introduced hearing aid functionality for AirPods and is reportedly developing models with cameras and artificial intelligence capabilities.
title: Apple's AirPods to Get Live Conversation Translation Feature With iOS 19 Update: Report

description: Redmi Note 14s has been launched as a rebranded version of the Redmi Note 13 Pro 4G, along with support for 4G connectivity and a MediaTek Helio G99-Ultra chipset. It features a 200-megapixel rear camera, a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, and an in-display fingerprint sensor. Here's everything you need to know about the Redmi Note 14s price and specifications.
title: Redmi Note 14s With 200-Megapixel Rear Camera, MediaTek Helio G99-Ultra Chipset Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Tamil Nadu will provide a subsidy of Rs. 20,000 to select gig workers for purchasing e-scooters, supporting the growing number of youth joining online delivery platforms. Gig workers, vital to the world's fifth-largest economy, are rising partly due to post-pandemic unemployment. The state will also launch an insurance scheme for 150,000 gig workers, offering compensation for accidental deaths and disability.
title: Tamil Nadu to Subsidise E-Scooter Purchases by Some Gig Workers

description: British officials privately met with US counterparts to address concerns about the UK pressuring Apple Inc. to create a backdoor for accessing Americans' encrypted data. These talks followed Apple's removal of its advanced encryption feature for cloud data in the UK, following a directive by authorities there requesting encryption circumvention to aid in specific national security and criminal investigations.
title: UK, US Said to Hold Talks in Bid to Resolve Apple Encryption Feud
